name: Enemy Hero
description:
Enemy hero is a game made in about 4 hours for a game jam.

Use your enemy pumpkin that damages your slingshot when being on it and shoot it to damage the real big enemy.

You get 1 Candy for each damage you deal on the big enemy.

Use Candy to upgrade, PUMPKIN DAMAGE, SLINGSHOT HP, ENEMY HP, to earn as much candy as possible.
